app.description: Split a BAM by chromosome group

option.name: OUT_FILE_PATTERN
option.description: output file pattern. MUST contain __GROUPID__ and must end with '.bam'

option.name: ADD_MOCK_RECORD
option.description: add mock record if no samRecord saved in bam

option.name: maxRecordsInRam
option.description: When writing files that need to be sorted, this will specify the number of records stored in RAM before spilling to disk

app.documentation:
Split a BAM by chromosome group. Create EMPTY bams if no reads was found for a given group.
